description: A full-sized polymer foregrip.  Allows for better handling of the firearm.  Has ribbed grooves on the front and the back, and two islands of rubber texture on the sides.

variants.description: A full-sized polymer foregrip with a textured rubber island.  The texture helps improve the degree of control, though its effect is limited by the small area.  <variant:black>
A full-sized polymer foregrip with a textured rubber island.  The texture helps improve the degree of control, though its effect is limited by the small area.  <variant:fde>
A full-sized polymer foregrip with a textured rubber island.  The texture helps improve the degree of control, though its effect is limited by the small area.  <variant:grey>

description: A full-sized foregrip.  Allows for better handling of the firearm.  Textured surface and deliberate finger grooves provide for excellent control over recoil.

variants.description: A full-sized foregrip.  The finger grooves and the texture help retain control of the firearm better than many alternatives.  <variant:black>
A full-sized foregrip.  The finger grooves and the texture help retain control of the firearm better than many alternatives.  <variant:fde>

description: A short polymer foregrip.  Allows for better handling of the firearm.  Has ribbed texture on the front and the back, and two islands of texture on the sides.

variants.description: A short polymer foregrip with a slight texture.  The texture helps improve the degree of control slightly, though its effect is limited by the shallow nature of the texture.  <variant:black>
A short polymer foregrip with a slight texture.  The texture helps improve the degree of control slightly, though its effect is limited by the shallow nature of the texture.  <variant:fde>
A short polymer foregrip with a slight texture.  The texture helps improve the degree of control slightly, though its effect is limited by the shallow nature of the texture.  <variant:olive>
